HomePage.title: Hello, I am Tzu-Yun Liang
HomePage.description: I am a software engineer & product designer<break></break>who loves to deliver high-quality digital solutions.

AboutPage.title: about me
AboutPage.description: I'm passionate about working alongside talented teams – backend developers, UI/UX designers, and stakeholders – to bring high-quality software solutions to life.<break></break>With a diverse skillset in Next.js, React, TypeScript, UI/UX design and API integration, I strive to contribute effectively. Plus, I've honed my skills in information security, version control and project management to ensure a smooth development process.
